text: The Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2013 was the eleventh edition of the Junior Eurovision Song Contest. It took place in Kyiv, Ukraine on 30 November 2013. The venue for the contest was announced on 10 April 2013, as the National Palace of Arts "Ukraina". Ukrainian broadcaster NTU was the host broadcaster for the event. This is the second time the contest as held in Kyiv, the first being the 2009 Contest. It was also be the second time in the history of the Junior Eurovision Song Contest that the event was held in last year's winning country. ==Confirmed participants== Draw Country Language Artist Song English translation Place Points 01 Swedish Elias Elffors Elfström "Det är dit vi ska" That's were we're going 9 46 02 Azerbaijani, English Rustam Karimov "Me and my guitar" __ 7 66 03 Armenia, English Monica Avensyan "Choco Fabric" __ 6 69 04 Italian Michele Perniola "O-o-O Solo Intorno A Me" O-o-O Sunlight all around me 10 42 05 Macedonian Barbara Popovic "Ohrid i muzika" (Охрид и музика) Ohrid and music 12 19 06 Ukrainian, English Sofia Tarasova "We are one" __ 2 121 07 Russian Ilya Volkov 1 Sing with me 3 108 08 Romanian, English Rafael Bobeica "Cum Sa Fim" How to be 11 41 09 Georgian, English The Smile Shop " Me Your Smile" __ 5 91 10 Dutch, English Mylène & Rosanne "Double Me" __ 8 59 11 English Gaia Gauchi "The Start" __ 1 130 12 Russian Dayana Krillova "Mechtay" (Мечтай) Dream On 4 106 == Scoreboard == Results Total Score San Marino Contestants Sweden 46 1 3 5 1 2 5 6 1 4 2 Azerbaijan 66 4 7 2 2 10 3 10 3 6 7 Armenia 69 3 4 4 4 12 2 4 12 6 8 5 San Marino 42 5 2 2 4 3 3 2 3 2 2 4 Macedonia 19 1 1 2 1 1 1 Ukraine 121 8 10 10 8 12 8 12 7 7 7 12 8 Belarus 108 10 5 6 6 6 7 8 10 8 8 10 12 Moldova 41 3 3 1 3 3 7 4 4 4 1 Georgia 91 7 8 7 10 10 3 7 8 5 5 6 Netherlands 59 2 6 5 5 1 5 4 6 1 2 7 3 Malta 130 12 8 7 10 7 12 12 10 12 6 12 10 Russia 106 6 12 12 12 8 6 7 8 5 5 10 3 All countries automatically receive 12 points === 12 Points === N.
